wrath.client

Class ClientUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • wrath.client.ClientUtils

  • public class ClientUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    General static utilities library. Contains assorted methods for the Client to use.

      • displayPopupMessage

        public static void displayPopupMessage(java.lang.String popupTitle,
                                       java.lang.String message,
                                       PopupMessageType type)
        Displays a pop-up message.
        Parameters:
        popupTitle - The title of the pop-up message.
        message - The message displayed on the pop-up.
        type - The type of message to display. Changes the icon.

      • getByteBufferToImage

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage getByteBufferToImage(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer,
                                                                int width,
                                                                int height)
        Converts a ByteBuffer (Used in OpenGL) to a BufferedImage.
        Parameters:
        buffer - The ByteBuffer that contains the image data.
        width - The Width (in pixels) of the image.
        height - The Height (in pixels) of the image.
        Returns:
        Returns the BufferedImage that contains the data from the ByteBuffer.

      • getImageToByteBuffer

        public static java.nio.ByteBuffer getImageToByteBuffer(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
        Loads a ByteBuffer (Used in OpenGL) from most images.
        Parameters:
        image - Image to convert.
        Returns:
        Returns the ByteBuffer converting from the original image.

      • getLWJGLBoolean

        public static int getLWJGLBoolean(boolean bool)
        Converts a primitive Java boolean to the LWJGL version of the boolean. Mostly a convenience method.
        Parameters:
        bool - The primitive Java boolean value.
        Returns:
        Returns the LWJGL version of the boolean.

      • get2DTexture

        public static int get2DTexture(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
        Loads a LWJGL Texture from an image.
        Parameters:
        image - The BufferedImage version of the Texture.
        Returns:
        Returns the LWJGL texture id.

      • loadImageFromFile

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage loadImageFromFile(java.io.File file)
        Loads a BufferedImage from a File.
        Parameters:
        file - The File to load the BufferedImage from.
        Returns:
        Returns the BufferedImage located in the File.

      • openUrlInBrowser

        public static void openUrlInBrowser(java.lang.String url)
        Opens the URL in the System's default web browser.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL in the form of a String.

      • throwInternalError

        public static void throwInternalError(java.lang.String message,
                                      boolean fatal)
        Displays an error message in modal form, and closes the program if fatal.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to display to the user.
        fatal - Determines whether or not the error is fatal, if fatal the program will close.
